title.rendered: 8 Ways to Leverage GDPR for Your Agency

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573234021896{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Plus tips on how marketing automation makes it easier

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1524669128869{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]While GDPR may feel a little like red tape, the new laws are designed to help us build trust with customers and provide a better user experience. And as marketers, that’s our end goal anyway, right?

In this issue of Agency Perspectives, SharpSpring partner Carlo van Tichelen of Phobos & Actor shares how he is re-framing GDPR to win over more clients and grow existing relationships. You’ll learn:

  • How SharpSpring will make it easy to stay compliant with the new laws.
  • The importance of having all of your prospect and customer data in one central place.
  • Why focusing on engagement is key to keeping your contacts subscribed.

[/vc_column_text]

Carlo van Tichelen

Phobos & Actor, Platinum Certified SharpSpring Agency Partner

“We should think of GDPR as a chance to do business in a new way. Besides having new processes in place for standardizing and protecting our data, we also get to be part of a new era of marketing, where we have countless opportunities to truly engage leads and customers.”

[vc_row][vc_column]

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
